old:
エレメントアーチャ―は、魔道弓と魔矢により
攻撃と味方支援両方を行い、さらには一度に
複数の相手を狙える神秘の狙撃手です

＜基本操作／攻撃＞
<PADM>　【<KC WEAPON_SUB>】闘波の構え（攻撃矢構え）<KEYM>　【<KC HOLD_BOW>】闘波の構え（攻撃矢構え）</KEYM>
<PADM>　【<KC WEAPON_SUB>】＋【右スティック】<KEYM>　【<KC HOLD_BOW>】＋【<ICON MOUSE>移動】</KEYM>
　　　　　　闘波の魔眼（複数敵ロックオン）
　構えながら【<KC SHOOT>】闘波の矢
　【<KC ATTACK1>】前蹴り
new:
The Element Archer uses a magical bow and magic arrows to perform both attacks and support for allies.
 They are a mystic sniper who can target multiple opponents at once.

<Basic Controls/Attack>
<PADM> Press [<KC WEAPON_SUB>] for Seeker Stance (Attack Arrow Stance).
<KEYM>Hold [<KC HOLD_BOW>] for Seeker Stance (Attack Arrow Stance)</KEYM>
<PADM>Hold [<KC WEAPON_SUB>] + move right stick <KEYM>Hold [<KC HOLD_BOW>] + <ICON MOUSE>move using the mouse</KEYM>
Magick Eye: Seeker (Locks onto multiple enemies)
While in stance, press [<KC SHOOT>] to shoot Seeker Arrow.
Press [<KC ATTACK1>] for a Front Kick.
